attributes.action: Tighten rules of this 3rd national lockdown so they are stricter than the 1st.
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair or effective to make the rules more lax and then try to scare individuals into being stricter than the rules allow.
attributes.background: Please follow the advice of your own scientific advisers and make the rules of this third lockdown stricter than the first, limiting activity allowed to the absolutely essential.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, what rules you would like to see changed.

You may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
